description: An extensible collection of responsive utilities.
name: furtive-responsive-utils
readme:
# Furtive Responsive Utilities

An extensible collection of responsive utilities. Used in [furtive.css](http://furtive.co).

## Installation

It's recommended to use [rework-npm](https://github.com/reworkcss/rework-npm):

```
npm install --save furtive-responsive-utils
```

```javascript
var rework = require('rework'),
    reworkNPM = require('rework-npm');

var output = rework('@import "furtive-responsive-utils";', { source: 'my-file.css' })
    .use(reworkNPM());
```

## Usage

Detailed documentation and examples can be found at [furtive.co](http://furtive.co).

## Acknowledgements

CSS adapted from <https://github.com/mrmrs/fluidity>.
